actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Astronautics
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Astronautics.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for activities of the National Science Foundation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: National Science Foundation Authorization Act - Makes appropriations of $579,6000,000 for activities of the National Science Foundation. Places restrictions on benefits under the Foundation's programs for any person convicted of a crime of force against an insituttion of higher education.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for activities of the National Science Foundation, and for other purposes.
